companyName: Cong ty TNHH Cong Nghe Mang Sao Kim (Ventech Co., Ltd. Ho Chi Minh Branch)
address1: 5th floor, 96 Cao Thang Street, Ward 4, District 3

partnerDetails.about:
We are headquartered in Singapore as a regional head office as part of Ventech Asia Group. It was incorporated in the year of 2000 and has rapidly grown into a dynamic company that is focused on the provision of practical and cost-effective network infrastructure solutions in data centers, telecommunication, corporate offices, commercial, hospitality, manufacturing factories, healthcare, residential, and retail sectors. Our structured cabling services (fiber optic cables) range from design to installation, implementation, maintenance and support.

Our experience spans a diversity of applications from consulting through implementation, management and maintenance of the system. Our depth of experience with technology and project management allows us to provide the highest levels of service and quality value for investment.

Ventech’s mission and policy statements include a commitment to provide the Global ICT Infrastructure products with the local excellent value-added services, develop and strengthen our Project Implementation Process (PIP) across Ventech offices and continually improve the effectiveness of the Quality Management System (QMS). Ventech’s QMS is in accordance with the requirements of being professional credentials BICSI RCDD recognition.
As a certified structured cabling specialist by many of the well-known infrastructure brands, we are leaders in the field of fiber optic solutions, structured cabling solutions, copper cables, testing and commissioning in demonstrating knowledge in the design, integration and implementation of information technology systems (ITS) and related infrastructure components. In complement with our value-added professional services, we also provide ICT Services and Managed Services.
